title: Creating Campaign - Successfully create a voting campaign
custom_preconds: Given that the user has the rights to create a voting campaign
custom_steps:
When a user logs into campaign manager
And taps on the the new campaign button
And taps on voting in the drop down
And fills in the necessary elements in the form
And taps on create
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the campaign page of the new voting campaign

title: Creating Campaign - Add another answer to the voting campaign
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the rights to create a voting campaign
And the user is on the 'New Voting Campaign' form
custom_steps:
When the user is on the the New voting campaign form
And fills all the required elements including the answer section
And taps on the 'Add Answer' button
And fill out the required elements for a new answer
And taps the create button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought to the campaign page of the new voting campaign
And see both answers in the keyword section

title: Creating campaign - Verify all help links
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the rights to create a voting campaign
And the user is on the New Voting Campaign page
custom_steps: When the user taps on any of the help links
custom_expected: Then a pop-up will appear explaining what that element is

title: Creating Campaign - Verify character remaining count
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the rights to create a voting campaign
And is on the new voting campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user enters any characters in:

"Max Votes Exceeded SMS MT"
"Question (only displayed in WebService campaigns)"
"Response SMS MT *"
custom_expected: Then as each character is typed the character should update accordingly

title: Creating Campaign - Adding informational message
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the rights to create a voting campaign
And the user is on the new voting campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the 'add message' button
And enters in a keyword
And enters in response sms mt
And enters in all other necessary elements
And taps on create button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought to the campaign page 
And in the informational section you will see the informational keywords

title: Creating Campaign - Create a voting contest
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a voting campaign
And the user is on the new campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the yes radio button for 'Is this a contest'
And enters in copy for the 'winner sms mt' with ${win code}
And enters in the 'consolation sms mt'
And enters in all other required elements
And taps on create button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought the campaign page of the new campaign
And the user will see the winner sms mt and consolation mt

title: Starting Campaign - Start a voting campaign from the main campaign dashboard
custom_preconds: Given there is a voting campaign that is either stopped or in a created state
custom_steps:
When the user taps the stopped or created button in the action column correlating to the voting campaign
And taps on 'Ok' on the confirmation page
And taps on the 'Close'
custom_expected: Then the user will see the stopped or created button turn into a green 'Running' button

title: Starting Campaign - Start a voting campaign from the campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs into an account with a voting campaign that is either created or stopped
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start button in the start the campaign section
And taps the ok button on the confirmation page
And taps on the click here page
custom_expected:
Then the user returns to the campaign page
And the start campaign page is replaced by stop the campaign section
And in the campaign run summary section the top date range now says running and a view link

title: Starting Campaign - Verify restarting campaign clears votes
custom_preconds:
Given there is a voting campaign
And it is currently running
And there is votes registered
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the stop button
And the user taps on the start button
And the user now taps on the view link in the Campaign Run Summary
custom_expected: Then the user will see all the votes reset back to 0

title: Testing Campaign - Verify votes can be cast from phone
custom_preconds: Given the user has logged into an account with a voting campaign active
custom_steps: When the user sends a text message to the short code 28444 with the message 'qamlb <voting keyword>'
custom_expected: Then the user will get a response on the phone to confirm the vote

title: Testing Campaign - Checking votes
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs in to an account with an active voting campaign
And that campaign has votes cast
And the user is on the campaign page of that voting campaign
custom_steps: When taps on the 'view' link in the campaign run summary section for the active run
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought to the Campaign Run Data page
And the vote should be logged
And the percentages should be correct
And all the information about the users who voted should be correct

title: Stopping Campaign - Stopping a voting campaign from main campaign dashboard
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs into an account with an active voting campaign
And the user is on the main campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the 'Running' button correlating to the active voting campaign
And taps on 'Ok' on the confirmation page
And taps on 'close'
custom_expected:
Then the voting campaign should be stopped
And the button should go from running to stopped.

title: Stopping Campaign - Stopping a voting campaign from the campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs into an account where there is an active voting campaign
And the user is on that campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the stop button in the stop the campaign section
And taps on ok on the confirmation page
And taps on click here to return to the campaign page
custom_expected:
Then the user will be returned to the campaign page
And there will no longer be a stop the campaign section
And there will now be a start the campaign section with a start button
And in the run campaign summary section the will be an end date for all runs

title: Expiring Campaign - Expire campaign from campaign page - running campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a voting campaign that is active
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps: When the user taps on the expire button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought to an error page that says:

"This campaign is currently running and cannot be expired."

title: Expiring Campaign - Expire a voting campaign from campaign page - stopped campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a voting campaign that is stopped
And the user is on the campaign page
And the campaign is in a stopped state
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the expire button
And taps on the ok button on the confirmation page
And taps on the click here to return home
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the main campaign dashboard
And the expired campaign will be hidden by default

title: Cloning Campaign - Clone a voting campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a voting campaign
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the clone button
And the required elements are filed in properly
And taps the create button
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the campaign page of the new voting campaign

title: Editing Campaign - Edit campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a voting campaign created
And that campaign has never been started
And the user is on that campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the edit button
And update the campaign
And the user taps on the update button
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought back to the campaign page with the updated information
